check_box.label: Disable Scripts
check_box.name: disable_scripts_check
check_box.tool_tip: Disable all scripts in this region

check_box.label: Disable Collisions
check_box.name: disable_collisions_check
check_box.tool_tip: Disable non-avatar collisions in this region

check_box.label: Disable Physics
check_box.name: disable_physics_check
check_box.tool_tip: Disable all physics in this region

button.label: Return avatar's scripted objects on other people's land
button.name: return_scripted_other_land_btn

button.label: Return ALL of avatar's scripted objects
button.name: return_scripted_all_btn

button.label: Get Top Colliders...
button.name: top_colliders_btn
button.tool_tip: List of objects experiencing the most potential collisions

button.label: Get Top Scripts...
button.name: top_scripts_btn
button.tool_tip: List of objects spending the most time running scripts

button.label: Restart Region
button.name: restart_btn
button.tool_tip: Give 2 minute countdown and restart region

button.label: Delay Restart
button.name: cancel_restart_btn
button.tool_tip: Delay region restart by one hour
